SA01asabhs_u:590: kathaṃ sanidarśanaṃ kati sanidarśanāni kimarthaṃ sanidarśanaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:599: kathaṃ sapratighaṃ kati sapratighāni kimarthaṃ sapratigha parīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:601: api khalu tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sapratighaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:602: jātito 'pi upacayato 'pi aparikarmakṛtato 'pi tatra jātitaḥ yadya(da)nyo 'nyamāvṛṇotyavriyate ca /
SA01asabhs_u:612: kathaṃ sāsravaṃ kati sāsravāṇi kimarthaṃ sāsravaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:613: āsravatadātmato 'pi āsravasaṃbandhato 'pi āsravānuvandhato 'pi āsravānukūlyato 'pi āsravānvayato 'pi sāsravaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:614: pañcopādānaskandhāḥ sāsravāḥ pañcadaśa dhātavo daśāyatanāni trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:620: kathaṃ saraṇaṃ kati saraṇāni kimarthaṃ saraṇaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:628: kathaṃ sāmiṣaṃ kati sāmiṣāṇi kimarthaṃ sāmiṣaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:632: kathaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ kati nirāmiṣāṇi kimarthaṃ nirāmiṣaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:636: kathaṃ gredhāśritaṃ kati gredhā śritāni kimarthaṃ gredhāśritaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:640: kathaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaṃ kati naiṣkramyāśritāni kimarthaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:644: kathaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ kati saṃskṛtāni kimarthaṃ saṃskṛtaparīkṣā yasyotpā do 'pi prajñāyate vyayo 'pi sthityanyathātvamapi tatsarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:656: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dvayamidaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ceti [?] //
SA01asabhs_u:658: yenāsaṃskṛtaṃ na tenārthena saṃskṛtamityatra nayo draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:659: kathaṃ laukikaṃ kati laukikāni kimarthaṃ laukikaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:660: traidhātukaparyāpannaṃ laukikaṃ lokottara pṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ ca tatpratibhāsam /
SA01asabhs_u:661: skandhānāmekadeśaḥ pañcadaśa dhātavaḥ daśāyatanāni trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:663: kathaṃ lokottaraṃ kati lokottarāṇi kimarthaṃ lokottaraparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:665: api khalu paryāyeṇa loko ttarapṛṣṭalabdhaṃ lokottaram /
SA01asabhs_u:674_0: ādyutpannaṃ prabandhotpannam upacayotpannam āśrayotpannaṃ vikārotpannaṃ paripākotpannaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:674_4: pūrvakālotpannaṃ maraṇakālo tpannam antarotpannaṃ pratisandhikālotpannaṃ ca //

SA01asabhs_u:684: api khalu aprāptagrāhakaṃ prāptagrāhakaṃ svalakṣaṇavarttamānapratyeka grāhakaṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇasarvakālaṃ sarvaviṣayagrāhakaṃ ca grāhakaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:687: kathaṃ grāhyaṃ kati grāhyāni kimarthaṃ grāhyaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:691: kathaṃ vahirmukhaṃ kati bahirmukhāni kimarthaṃ bahirmukha parīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:692: kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ bahirmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā buddhaśāsane śrutamayacintāmayatadanudharmaparigṛhītāṃ ścittacaitasikān dharmān /
SA01asabhs_u:693: ca tvāro dhātavaḥ dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāṃ caikadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:697: catuto dhātūn sthāpayitvā dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāmekadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:699: [Abhidh-s_21] kathaṃ kliṣṭaṃ kati kliṣṭāni kimarthaṃ kliṣṭaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:701: nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ punaḥ sarvatragamanaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ kleśo rūpārūpya pratisaṃyu(kta)śca /
SA01asabhs_u:706: aṣṭau dhātavaḥ aṣṭāyatanāni skandhānāṃ śeṣāṇāṃ ca dhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:709_0: utpannaniruddha lakṣaṇato 'pi hetuphalopayo gato 'pi saṃkleśavyavadānakāritra samatikrāntito
SA01asabhs_u:712_0: hetau satya nutpannato 'pi alabdhasva lakṣaṇato 'pi hetuphalānupayogato 'pi saṃkleśavyavadānabhāvā
SA01asabhs_u:712_1: pratyupasthānato 'pi hetusvabhā vābhāvato 'pi abhinandanāsaṃkleśa nimittato 'pi abhinandanāvyavadānanimittato
SA01asabhs_u:715: kathaṃ pratyutpannaṃ kati pratyutpannāni kimarthaṃ pratyutpannaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:716_1: 'pi atītānāgata bhāva nimittato 'pi kāritrapratyupasthānato 'pi pratyutpannaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:721: kathaṃ [Abhidh-s_22] kuśalaṃ kati kuśalāni kimarthaṃ kuśalaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:722_0: svabhāvato 'pi sambandhato 'pi anubandhato 'pi utthānato 'pi paramārthato 'pi upapattilābhato
SA01asabhs_u:723: skandhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātunāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatānānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:725: svabhāvataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat śraddhādaya ekādaśa caitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:735: eṣāmeva kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pūrvābhyāsamāgamyaṃ tadrūpā vipākābhinirvṛtiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:736: yathā teṣveva prakṛtyā apratisaṃkhyāya rūciḥ saṃtiṣṭhate //
SA01asabhs_u:738: satpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamya saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāraṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiṃ kuśalasya bhāvanā //
SA01asabhs_u:740: yattathāgataṃ vā puraskṛtya caitye vā pustagate vā citragate dharmaṃ vā puraskṛtya dharmādhiṣṭhāni pustake pūjākarma //
SA01asabhs_u:744: yaddānamayena puṇyakriyāvastunā vā śīlamayena vā svargopapattiparigraho vā āḍhyo kulopapattiparigraho vā vyavadānānukūlyaparigraho vā pratipakṣataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
SA01asabhs_u:745: yo vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣaḥ ādhārapratipakṣa dūrobhāva pratipakṣaḥ viṣkambhaṇāpratipakṣaḥ visaṃyogapratipakṣaḥ kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣaḥ jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:747_0: yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya
SA01asabhs_u:747_1: sarvakleśaprahāṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaḥ sopadhiśeṣo nirupadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhāturapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:749: upaśamaprāptasya tadādhipatyena vaiśeṣikā guṇā abhijñādayo laukikalokottarāḥ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:751_0: svabhāvato 'pi saṃbandhato 'pi anubandhato 'pi utthānato 'pi paramārthato 'pi upapattilābhato
SA01asabhs_u:755: manaḥsaṃprayuktaṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kleśaṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ klaśopakleśo duścaritasamutthāpakaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:764: yathāpi tadakuśalā bhyāsa stūdapo vipāko 'bhinivarttate yenākuśala eva rūciḥ santiṣṭhate //
SA01asabhs_u:766: yathāpi tadasatpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamyasaddharmaśravaṇamayoni śomanaskāraṃ kāyena duścaritaṃ carati vācā manasā duścarītaṃ carati //
SA01asabhs_u:768_0: yathāpi tadanyatamānyatamaṃ devanikāyasanniśrayaṃ puraskṛtya hiṃsāpūrvakaṃ vā kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:768_1: vā caityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati tatra vā pūjākarma prayojayati yatra mahān janakāyo 'puṇyena yujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:770: yathāpi tatsattveṣu kāyena vācā manasā mithyā pratipadyate //
SA01asabhs_u:772: yathā tatkāyena duścaritaṃ caritvā vācā manasā duścaritaṃ caritvā durgatau vā sugatau vā aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ gṛṇhātyakṣepakaṃ vā paripūrakaṃ vā //
SA01asabhs_u:775: pari panthato 'kuśalaṃ katamat ye kuśalāntarāyikā dharmāḥ //

SA01asabhs_u:777_1: 'pi prayogato 'pi puraskārato 'pi anugrahato 'pi upabhogato 'pi parigrahato 'pi pratipakṣato
SA01asabhs_u:781: aṣṭau rūpīṇi dhātvāyatanāni sasaṃprayogaṃ manojīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgo nāma kāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyāśca //
SA01asabhs_u:783: aduṣṭāprasannacittasya taireva nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ parigṛhītāḥ cittacaitasikā [Abhidh-s_24] dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:792: prayogato 'vyākṛtaṃ katamat akliṣṭākuśalacetasa airyāpathikaṃ śailpasthānikaṃ ca //

SA01asabhs_u:794_1: caityaṃ vā pratiṣṭhāpayati pūjākarma vā prayojayati yatra mahājanakāyo na puṇyaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:796: yathāpi taddāsabhṛtakakarmakareṣu putradāreṣu vā aduṣṭāprasannacitto dānaṃ dadāti //
SA01asabhs_u:800: yathāpi tacchilpasthānasyābhyastatvādāyatyāṃ tadrūpaṃ mātmabhāvaparigrahaṃ karoti yena laghu ladhveva teṣu śilpasthāneṣu śikṣāniṣṭhāṃ gacchati //
SA01asabhs_u:809: yadbuddhāḥ paramapāramiprāptāśca bodhisattvā nidarśayanti sattvānāmanugrahārthaṃ na tu teṣāṃ tatra tathā kācit pariniṣpattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:810: kathaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ kati kā(ma)pratisaṃyuktāni kimarthaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:812: catvāro dhātavo dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāṃ ca skandhadhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:816: caturo dhātūna dve cāyatane sthāpayitā tadanyeṣāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:822: vairāgyaṃ punarekadeśavairāgyaṃ skalavairāgyaṃ prativedhavairāgyamupaghātavairāgyaṃ samudghātavairāgyaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:824_1: pratipakṣavairāgyaṃ parijñāvairāgyaṃ prahāṇi vairāgyaṃ sottaravairāgyaṃ niruttaravairāgyam //
SA01asabhs_u:826: duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dhamaṣu yā pratikulatā //
SA01asabhs_u:832: uccataraṃ sthānaṃ prāptava to nirhīne sthāne yā pratikūlatā //

SA01asabhs_u:840: bhūmau bhūmau kleśān prajahato yā pratikūlatā //
SA01asabhs_u:845: kathaṃ śaikṣaṃ kati śaikṣāṇi kimarthaṃ śaikṣaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:851: skandhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ /

SA01asabhs_u:854: pṛthagjanasya kuśalākuśalāvyakṛtaṃ śaikṣasya kliṣṭāvyākṛtamaśaikṣasya cāvyākṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:855: aṣṭau dhātavo 'ṣṭā vāyatanāni tadanyeṣāṃ [Abhidh-s_26] skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:857: kathaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ kati darśanaprahātavyāni kimarthaṃ darśanaprahātavyaparīkṣā /

SA01asabhs_u:858_1: yacca dṛṣṭyā samutthāpitaṃ kāyavā kkarma sarvaṃ cāpāyikaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:861: kathaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ kati bhāvanāprahātavyāni kimarthaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:867: skaṃdhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:869: kathaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ kati pratītyasamutpannāni kimarthaṃ pratītyasamutpannaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:878: dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇopadānaṃ bhavo jāti rjarāmaraṇaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:890: vāsanāto 'pyāvedhato 'pi manasikārato 'pi sahabhāvato 'pyāṅgānāṃ pratyayatvavyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ tacca yathāyogam //
SA01asabhs_u:893: bhave ca sattvān saṃmohayati pratyayaśca [Abhidh-s_27] bhavati saṃskārāṇām //
SA01asabhs_u:895: gatiṣu ca sattvān vibhajanti pratyayāśca bhavanti vijñānavāsanāyāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:897: sattvānāṃ karmabandhaṃ ca dhārayati pratyayaśca bhavati nāmarūpasya //
SA01asabhs_u:899: ātmabhāvaṃ ca sattvān grāhayati pratyayaśca bhavati ṣaḍāyatanasya //
SA01asabhs_u:901: ātmabhāvaparipūriṃ ca sattvān grāhayati pratya yaśca bhavati sparśasya //
SA01asabhs_u:903: viṣayopabhoge ca sattvān pravarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati vedanāyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:905: janmopabhoge ca sattvān pravarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati tṛṣṇāyāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:907: janmani ca sattvānākarṣayati pratyayaśca bhavati upādānasya //
SA01asabhs_u:909: punarbhavādānārthaṃ sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti pratyayaśca bhavati bhavasya //
SA01asabhs_u:911: punarbhave ca sattvānabhimukhīkaroti pratyayaśca bhavati jāteḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:913: nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanānupūrvyā ca sattvānabhinirvarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati jarāmaraṇasya //
SA01asabhs_u:917: yā cāvidyā yā ca tṛṣṇā yaccopādānamityayaṃ saṃkleśasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:918: ye ca saṃskārā yacca vijñānaṃ yaśca bhava ityayaṃ karmasaṃkleśasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:923: anityārthaḥ kṣaṇikārthaḥ hetuphalaprabandhānupacchedārthaḥ anurūpahetuphalārthaḥ vicitrahetuphalārthaḥ pratiniyatahetuphalārthaśca pratītyasamutpādārthaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:925: hetu gāmbhīryato 'pi lakṣaṇagāmbhīryato 'pi utpattibhāgāmbhīryato 'pi sthitigāmbhīryato 'pi vṛttigāmbhīryato 'pi gāmbhīryaṃ draṣṭavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:929: na svato na parato na dvābhyāṃ na svayaṃkārāpa(ra)kārāhetusamutpannaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:936: kathaṃ pratyayaḥ kati pratyayāḥ kimarthaṃ pratyayaparīkṣā /

SA01asabhs_u:947: sthitikāraṇaṃ tadyathā āhāro bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:970: tadyathā vijñānasya indriyamaparibhinnaṃ viṣaya ābhāsagataḥ tajjaśca manaskāraḥ pratyupasthitaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:982: pūrvabhāvitānāṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭatarā puṣṭatamā pravṛttiḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:994_2: dhipatito 'pi lokottaraviśuddhya dhipatito 'pi adhipati pratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:995: kathaṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgaṃ kati sabhāgatatsabhāgāni kimarthaṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgaparīkṣā /

SA01asabhs_u:1014: kathaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatā kati saṃskāraduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatāparīkṣā /

SA01asabhs_u:1029: api khalvāhāro 'śuddhā śrayasthitikaḥ śuddhāśuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ śuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ sthitisāṃdarśinakaśca draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1030: kathaṃ sottaraṃ [Abhidh-s_31] kati sottarāṇi kimarthaṃ sottaraparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:1042: skandhadhātvāyataneṣvātmeti vā sattvo jīvo jantuḥ poṣo pugdalo manujo mānava iti vā yatparikalpyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1052: teṣāmevaskandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ dravyamantaḥ prajñaptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamantaḥ rūpiṇo 'rūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanā anidarśanā ityevamādi yathānirddiṣṭaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1065: api khalu ṣaḍvidhaḥ prabhedaḥ eṣāmeva skandhadhātvāyatananām /
SA01asabhs_u:1066: bahirmukhaprabhedaḥ antarmukhaprabhedaḥ āyata kālabhedaḥ paricchinnakālaprabhedaḥ tatkālaprabhedaḥ saṃdarśanaprabhedaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:1074: śaikṣāṇāṃ sthāpayitvā caramakṣaṇe skandhadhātvāyatanāni [Abhidh-s_32] tadanyāni aśaikṣāṇām //
SA01asabhs_u:1078: buddhānāṃ pāramiprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca sanidarśanāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni // 0 //
SA01asabhs_u:1082_0: lakṣaṇasaṃgrahaḥ dhātusaṃgrahaḥ jātisaṃgrahaḥ avasthāsaṃgrahaḥ sahāyasaṃgrahaḥ deśasaṃgrahaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:1095: evaṃ tadanye skandhā dhātava āyatanāni ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1103: yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśa saṃgraho veditavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1105: yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1106: itaretarasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ rūpaskandhasaṃgrahe kati dhātavaḥ katyāyatanāni /
SA01asabhs_u:1129: tadvat tadanye dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanairnirdṛśyante anye ca na skandhadhātvāyatanairnirddiśyante /
SA01asabhs_u:1130: yathā dravyamantaḥ prajñāptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamanto jñeyā vijñeyā abhijñeyā rūpiṇo 'rūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanā anidarśanā ityevamādayaḥ pūrvaṃ nirdṛṣṭāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1135: yathā yathā ālambaneṣu cittābhisaṃkṣepaḥ tathā tathā kuśalamūlābhivṛddhiḥ // 0 //
SA01asabhs_u:1139: avinirbhāga saṃprayogaḥ miśrībhāva saṃprayogaḥ samavadhānasaṃprayogaḥ sahabhāvasaṃprayogaḥ kṛtyānuṣṭhānasaṃprayogaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1143: [Abhidh-s_34] paramāṇorūrdhvaṃ sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ rūpāṃśikānāṃ parasparaṃ miśrībhāvaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1147: ekasmin kāye skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sahakālapravṛttiḥ samamutpatti sthitinirodhāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1158: api khalu kliṣṭasarvatragaḥ saṃprayogo manasi caturṇṇāṃ kleśānām //
SA01asabhs_u:1159: kādācitkaḥ saṃprayogastadyathā citte śraddhādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ ca kleśopakleśānām //
SA01asabhs_u:1164: bahirmukhaḥ saṃprayogo yadbhūyasā kāma pratisaṃyuktānāṃ cittacaitasikānām //
SA01asabhs_u:1166: ucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ pārthagjanikānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ tadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇām //
SA01asabhs_u:1167: anucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ lokottarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāmādyataduttarāṇāṃ lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhānāṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1169: cittamātre vedanādīnāṃ sāṃkleśikānāṃvyāvadānikānāñca dharmāṇāṃ saṃprayogaṃ jānāti /
SA01asabhs_u:1170: tacca jānanātmā vedayate saṃjānāti cetayate smarati saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate cetayatya bhiniveśaṃ prajahāti nairātmyamavatarati //
SA01asabhs_u:1178: kāmadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktaiśca kleśopakleśairvījasamancāgamena samancāgataḥ upapattiprātilābhikaiśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1180: rūpadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ klaiśopakleśaiḥ vījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato 'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1185: traidhātu kapratipakṣa lābhī yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpannastasya bījasamanvāgamenāsamanvāgataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1188: prayogikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vaśitāsamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ laukikānāṃ lokottarāṇāṃ vā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyādīnāṃ tadekatyājāṃ(cā) vyākṛtānām //
SA01asabhs_u:1190: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ yo ya eva dharmaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ kuśalo vā akuśalo vā avyākṛto vā tasya samudācārasamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1191: samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato 'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1196: tathā ācayāpacayajño na kasyāṃ cillaukikyāṃ saṃpattau vipattau vā ekāntikasaṃjñī bhavati yāvadevānunayapratighaprahāṇāya //
SA01asabhs_u:1200: viniścayaḥ katamaḥ / satyaviniścayo dharmaviniścayaḥ prāptiviniśca sāṃkathyaviniścayaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1206: narakasattvajanmatiryakpreteṣu manuṣyeṣu pūrvavideheṣvapagodānīyeṣu jāmbūdvīpeṣu uttareṣu kuruṣu deveṣu caturmā(hā)
SA01asabhs_u:1207: rājakāyikeṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu brahmapurohiteṣu mahābrāhmeṣuparīttābheṣva (pramāṇābheṣu ābhāsvareṣu parīttaśubheṣva)
SA01asabhs_u:1213_0: pṛthivīmaṇḍale sumeruḥ saptakāñcanaparvatāḥ catvāro dvīpāḥ aṣṭāvantaradvīpāḥ abhyantaraḥ
SA01asabhs_u:1213_2: sthānāntarāṇi cakracāḍaḥ parvataḥ ākāśe vimānāni yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1213_3: paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ devānāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca asurāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi nārakāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi /
SA01asabhs_u:1214_0: uṣṇanarakāḥśītanarakāḥ pratyekanarakāśca tadekatyānāṃ ca tiryakpretānāṃ sthānāntarāṇi
SA01asabhs_u:1214_1: yāvadādityāḥ paricaranto diśo 'vabhāsayante vairocanāstāvatsāhasrake loke sahasraṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1214_2: candrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryaṇāṃ sahasraṃ sumerūṇāṃ parvatarājāṇāṃ sahasraṃ caturṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1214_3: sahasraṃ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sahasraṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sahasraṃ yāmānāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1214_4: sahasraṃ tuṣitānāṃ sahasraṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ sahasraṃ paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ sahasraṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1215: sahasraṃ sahasracūḍikānāṃ dhātūnāmucyate dvitīyo [Abhidh-s_37] madhyamasāhasro lokadhātuḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1217: evaṃ sa trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ mahācakravāḍa parvatamaṇḍala pariveṣṭitaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1219: tathā ca devaḥ cakrākārān vṛṣṭivindūn nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mākāśād varṣati /
SA01asabhs_u:1220: tathā ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mapramāṇo lokadhātuḥ saṃvarttiṣyate vā vivarttiṣyate vā saṃvarttate vā saṃvṛttastiṣṭhati vā vivarttate vā vivṛttastiṣṭhati vā /
SA01asabhs_u:1221: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi tathā sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu /
SA01asabhs_u:1222: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśaḥ janitaḥ karmakleśādhipateyaśca sarvamucyate duḥkhasatyam /
SA01asabhs_u:1223: pariśuddhalokadhātustu na duḥkhasatyasaṃgṛhīḥto na karmakleśa janitaḥ na karmakleśādhipateyaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:1224: kevalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānena vyavadānakuśalamūlādhipatinā ākṛṣyate tadutpattisthānaṃ cācintyaṃ kevalaṃ buddhena budhyate na dhyāyināṃ dhyānagocaraḥ kiṃ punaḥ cintayatām //
SA01asabhs_u:1226_0: "jātirduḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1226_1: priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham" //
SA01asabhs_u:1244: saṃvādhaduḥkhaṃ vipariṇati duḥkhaṃ saṃprayogaduḥkhaṃ viprayogaduḥkhaṃ kāmyaphalābhāvaduḥkhaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1249: tatra kathaṃ tisṛṣu saṃgṛhītānyaṣṭau aṣṭasu vā saṃgṛhītāstisraḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1251: jātirdukhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhirduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhamiti santānaduḥkhaduḥkhatā /
SA01asabhs_u:1252: priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ tadvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā /
SA01asabhs_u:1255: tat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ paramārthasatyena duḥkhaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1256: katamat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ katamat paramārthasatyena duḥkham /
SA01asabhs_u:1257: jātirduḥkhaṃ yāvat yadapīcchann labhate tadapi duḥkhamiti saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkham /
SA01asabhs_u:1258: yaduktaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paramārthasatyena duḥkham //
SA01asabhs_u:1263_1: kṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ prabandhalakṣaṇaṃ vyādhyādi lakṣaṇaṃ cittacittākāravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ bhogasaṃpattirvipatti
SA01asabhs_u:1287: kadācit sārāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati kadācid vītarāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:1288_0: yadvat sadveṣaṃ vā vītadveṣaṃ vā samohaṃ vā vītamohaṃ vā saṃkṣiptaṃ vā vihisāṃ vā
SA01asabhs_u:1288_1: nimnaṃ vā unnataṃ vā uddhataṃ vā anuddhataṃ vā upaśāntaṃ vā anupaśāntaṃ vā samāhita vā asamāhitaṃ vā /
SA01asabhs_u:1294: tisṛṇāṃ saṃvarttarnānāṃ śīrṣāṇi dvitīya tṛtīya caturthadhyānāni /
SA01asabhs_u:1295: caturthadhyāne vāhyānāṃ vimānānāṃ tu vāhyābhāvat eva saṃvarttavivarttaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1296: kevalaṃ tairdevaiḥ tāni vimānāni saha nirvarttante saha nirudhyante etaducyate saṃvartta vivarttaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1309: sattvā āyuḥkṣayād vā puṇya kṣayād vā karmakṣayād vā tasmādadhiṣṭhānāt cyavante iti /
SA01asabhs_u:1319: tisro duḥkhatāḥ aṣṭākā vā duḥkhaṃ ṣaḍākāraṃ vā [Abhidh-s_40] duḥkhaṃ bāhulyena pūrvamuktaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ nāma /
SA01asabhs_u:1320: kiṃ pratītyasūtre uktaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti /
SA01asabhs_u:1325: tathā ca saṃskārānityatāṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mayā yatkiṃcid veditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti //
SA01asabhs_u:1326: api khalu utpādavyayadharmadvayānugateṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādayo 'ṣṭau duḥkhāni /
SA01asabhs_u:1327: prajñāyante ityabhisaṃdhāya buddhena bhāṣitaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti /
SA01asabhs_u:1328: api ca anityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ prajñāyate iti anityato duḥkhaṃ na sarve saṃskārā ityatrādhisandhirveditavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1341: tacca ātmano nāstitā anātmano 'stitā satī śūnyatā //
SA01asabhs_u:1352: etadabhisaṃghāyoktaṃ bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti //
SA01asabhs_u:1353: api coktaṃ bhagavatā naitat sarvaṃ mama naiṣo 'hamasmi na me sa ātmā iti /
SA01asabhs_u:1354: evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajñāya draṣṭhavyam iti tasya ko 'rtha uktaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1363: yathā cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatā tathā rūpādīnāmapi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā /
SA01asabhs_u:1364: cittopāttatāmupādāya cittaikayogakṣematāmupādāya cittavikāratadvikāratāmupādāya cittāśrayatāmudāpādāya cittādhipatyasaṃbhūtatāmupādāya cittvaśavarttināṃ copādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:1365: api khalu atyantavikāropālabdhitāmupādāya utpannasya cānapekṣya pratyayaṃ svarasavināśitāmupādāya rūpasyāpi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā //
SA01asabhs_u:1366: yaduktaṃ yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvantaccatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāyeti /
SA01asabhs_u:1370: yatra punaḥ samudāye yadbhūtamupalabhyate tattatrā stiti vaktavya /
SA01asabhs_u:1372: upādāyarūpe 'pi yadupādāyarūpaṃ yasmin samudāya upalabhyate tattatrāstīti veditavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:1373: yatpunarūcyate paramāṇusaṃcitto rūpa samudāya iti tatra niḥśarīraḥ [Abhidh-s_42] paramāṇurveditavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1374: buddhyā paryantaprabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ piṇḍasaṃjñāvibhāghanatāmupādāya rūpe dravyāḥ pariniṣpattipraveśatāṃ copādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:1375: tat punaretad duḥkhamasti vipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitā saṃlikhitaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1376: asti madhyamasaṃlikhitam asti tanukamasaṃlikhitam asti tanuttaraṃ saṃlikhitam asti tanutamaṃ saṃlikhitam astyaduḥkhaṃ duḥkhapratibhāsaṃ mahāsaṃlekhapratyupasthānaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1398: paṭuka eva cittaprakāre svākuśalamulabalādhā nato vā paropasaṃhārato vā akuśalacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:1399: paṭuke vā cittaprakāre apaṭuke vā tadubhayavai kalyādabhisaṃskārāsamarthasya vā avyākṛtacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:1403: tadyathā kṛṣṇasya kutapasya nirbhāso 'ndhakāratamisrāyā vā rātryāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1404: aśubhakāriṇastadyathā śuklasya parasya nirbhāsajyotsnāyā vā rātryāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1412: upapattyāyatane tulāvanāmonnāmayogena cyavate pratisandhi ca vadhnāti /
SA01asabhs_u:1416: sa ca vipākastata ūrdhvamindriyābhinrivṛttiḥ yathā pratityasamutpāde catṛsṛṣvāyoniṣu /
SA01asabhs_u:1422: bhagavatā tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī samudayasatyanirdeśena nirdiṣṭā //
SA01asabhs_u:1426: tatha hi tṛṣṇā vastusarvatragā avasthāsarvatragā adhvasarvatragā dhātusarvatragā eṣaṇā sarvatragā prakārasarvatragā ca keśaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1427: parisaṃkhyānato 'pi lakṣaṇato 'pyutthāna to 'pyālambanato 'pi saṃprayogato 'pi paryāyato 'pi vipratipattito 'pi dhatuto 'pi nikāyato 'pi prahāṇato 'pi kleśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1432: ta eva dṛṣṭeḥ pañcākārjabhedena daśa bhavanti //
SA01asabhs_u:1434: yo dharma utpadyamāno 'praśāntalakṣaṇa utpadyamānena yena kāya cittaprabandhāpraśamapravṛttiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1437: kleśānuśayaścāprahīṇo bhavati kleśasthānīyaśca dharma ābhāsagato bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:1438: tatra ca ayoniśo manaskāraḥ pratyavasthito bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:1443: api khalu kāmāvacaraḥ kleśaḥ sthāpayitvā avidyā dṛṣṭi vicikitsāṃ ca tadanyaḥ urdhvabhūmyanālambanaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1457: pratigho rāgeṇa mānena dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1458: mānaḥ pratighena vicikitsayā ca na saṃprayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1464: dṛṣṭiḥ pratighena vicikitsayā ca na saṃprayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1467: styānamauddhatyamāśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ pramādaśca sarvatra kliṣṭe saṃprayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1470_0: saṃyojanaṃ bandhanaṃ anuśayaḥ upakleśaḥ paryavasthānam oghaḥ yogaḥ upādānam granthaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:1470_1: nivaraṇam khilaḥ malaḥ nighaḥ śalyaḥ kiṃcanaḥ duścaritam āsravaḥ vighātaḥ paridāhaḥ

SA01asabhs_u:1481: sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu na dharmeṣu cittasya vihiṃsā /
SA01asabhs_u:1489: hīnān śreyānasmi (a) sadṛśena sadṛśo 'smīti vā yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1491: sadṛśāt śreyānasmi śreyasā sadṛśo 'smīti vā yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1497: aprāpta uttare viśeṣā dhigame prāpto mayeti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1513: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena saṃprayukto mithyāniḥsaraṇaṃ parikalpitavipratisāraṃ paryeṣane abhiniviśate /
SA01asabhs_u:1523: vicikitsāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu ratneṣu vicikitsate ratnatrayaṃ na samudāvarati /
SA01asabhs_u:1528: īrṣyāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto lābhasatkārān anunayati dharmaṃ na gurukaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:1533: mātsaryasaṃyojanena saṃprayukta upacayamanunayati ta dvarjanatāṃ ca na satkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:1541: apica rāgadveṣamohānniśritya kuśalasamudācāreṣu na vaśavarttitāṃ labhate /
SA01asabhs_u:1544: kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayaḥ bhavarāgānuśayaḥ mānānuśayaḥ avidyānuśayaḥ dṛṣṭayanuśayaḥ vicikitsānuśayaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:1561: te sattvā hīnapratipakṣaṃ labhante mado mānaścotpadyate āryasatyeṣu saṃmohaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:1562: mithyāmokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca saṃtorayanti buddhaśāsanadharmavinayeṣu vimatiḥ vicikitsā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1565: kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvaścaitasiko dharmaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1567: ṣaḍrāgādīn kleśān sthāpayitvā kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ krodhādikaścaitasiko dharmaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1568: api khalu rāgo dveṣo mohaśca caitasikā upakleśā ucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:1569: yaiścitte upakleśo na vairāgyaṃ na viumokṣo nāvaraṇaprahāṇam /
SA01asabhs_u:1571: tathā ca bhagavatoktam dīrgharātraṃ vo rāgadveṣamohā upakliśyantui vikṣipanti citraṃ saṃkliśyanti /
SA01asabhs_u:1574: punaḥ punaḥ udvegena cittaṃ paryayanahyantīti paryavasthānāni /
SA01asabhs_u:1575: tathāca śamathapragrahanimittabhāvanākāle tatsanniśraya brahmacaryā diśuddhi saṃgṛhītaśīla kāle cittaṃ paryavanahyanti //
SA01asabhs_u:1601: ātmavādopādāne tu tīrthyā anyo 'nyaṃ na vivadanti /
SA01asabhs_u:1614: kāmacchandanivaraṇam vyāpādanivaraṇam styānamiddhanivaraṇam auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇam vicikitsānivaraṇaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1616: tacca pravrajyāyāmabhiratau codanāyāṃ pratipattau śamathe pragrahe upekṣāyāṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1620: cittasyādāntatayā akarmaṇyatayā durvimokṣatayā ca sattvaistasyāścaryāyā durbhedyatvāt khila ityucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1624_0: tat saṃprajānabdiḥ sabrahmacāribhirgrāme vā araṇye vā tathā kurvantaṃ paśyadbhirucyate
SA01asabhs_u:1624_1: ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmān karotyevaṃ kṛtyaṃ caratyevamācaritaṃ grāmakaṇṭaka āmiṣo 'śuciḥ / ato malā nāma //
SA01asabhs_u:1627: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya dīrghakālaṃ punaḥ punarjātimaraṇeṣu vilaśyante ityucyante nighāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1630_0: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu vā adhyeṣaṇāsamutpādena prabandhānupacchedena
SA01asabhs_u:1630_1: buddhe dharme saṃghe duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgeṣu vā vicikitsāsamutpādena vā śalyā nāma //
SA01asabhs_u:1633: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya vittasaṃcayeṣu sabhayāḥ savairā bhūyo vihāravikṣepāḥ kiṃcanā nāma /
SA01asabhs_u:1654: abhāve vighāte sarvadā dāridya duḥkhādibhiḥ kliṣṭā bhavantīti vighātāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1658: tena nimittānuvyañjanābhiniveśena kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti paridāhāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1665: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa śastrādānadaṇḍādibhiḥ raṇayanti nānāvidhaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kalahaṃ kurvantīti rāgādayo raṇā ucyante //
SA01asabhs_u:1668: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa adharmarāgeṇa mahādahanena paridahanti viṣamalobhena mahādahanena paridahanti mithyādharmeṇa mahādahanena paridahantīti jvarā nāma //
SA01asabhs_u:1671: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa jātimaraṇamūleṣu saṃskāreṣu saṃyojayanti saṃjanayanti sattvān nānāvidhakāyeṣu pañcagatisaṃsāreṣu abhinirvarttayantīti rāgādayo vanasā ityucyante //
SA01asabhs_u:1674: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa kāyasāpekṣatā vittasāpekṣatā bodhyabhāvaḥ kolāhalaratiḥ parittakuśaladharmalābhe 'pi santoṣaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1678: rāgaḥ pratighaśca dvau kleśau viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipannau /
SA01asabhs_u:1684: daśa kleśā duḥkhe samudaye ca vipratipannāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1686: punaḥ daśa kleśā nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1691: api khalu rāgaḥ kāmadhātau sukhasaumanasyopekṣābhi saṃprayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1700: yathā mānastathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1718: api khalu rāgaḥ pratigho mānaśca kāmadhātau vastvekadeśapravṛttikāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1719: kāmadhātuvad rūpadhātāvārūpyadhātāvapi śiṣṭāḥ kleśāḥ sarvatra sarvavastu pravṛttikāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1729: rūpadhātau duḥkhādicaturvidhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ pratyekaṃ navakleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham /
SA01asabhs_u:1731: evaṃ ca darśanaprahātavyakleśanikāyā dvādaśādhikaṃ śataṃ kleśāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1733: sahajā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antaprāhadṛṣṭiḥ rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1734: rūpadhātau bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ pañca kleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham /
SA01asabhs_u:1747: anutpannasyānutpādata utpannasya varjanato vā pratipakṣa lābhamārgaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1750: asaṃbhinnālambanena manaskāreṇa sarvadharmā anātmāna iti paśyati /
SA01asabhs_u:1759: yathā yathā dauṣṭhulyamutpadyate tathā tathā pratipakṣa utpadyate yathā yathā pratipakṣa utpadyate tathā tathā dauṣṭhulyanirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1767: upalabdhikarma kāritrakarma vyavasāyakarma pariṇatikarma prāptikarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1773: tāni trīṇi kāyavāṅmanaskarmāṇi akuśalāni kuśalāni ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1775: prāṇātipātaḥ adattādānam kāmamithyācāraḥ mṛṣāvādaḥ piśunavāk paruṣavāk saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ abhidyā vyāpādaḥ mithyādṛṣṭiśca /
SA01asabhs_u:1778_0: prāṇātipātād viratiḥ adattādānādviratiḥ kāmamithyācārādviratiḥ mṛṣāvādādviratiḥ piśunavāco
SA01asabhs_u:1778_1: viratiḥ paruṣavāco viratiḥ saṃbhinnapralāpādviratiḥ anabhidhyā avyāpādaḥ samyagdṛṣṭiśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1782: katamāni cetanākarmāṇi parājñaptisaṃcetanīyatākarma paramasaṃjñaptisaṃcetatīyatākarma avijñāyasaṃcetanīyatākarma mūlābhiniveśasacetanīyatākarma viparyāsasaṃcetanīyatākarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1783: teṣu mūlābhiniveśasaṃcetanīyatākarma viparyāsaṃcetana yatā karma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1784: teṣu mūlābhiniveśasaṃcetanīyatā karmaviparyāsasaṃcetanīyatākarmabhyāṃ yadi kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ ca na nāsya vipākaḥ pratisaṃvedyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1790: tanna daśānāmakuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ triṣu apāyeṣu /
SA01asabhs_u:1793: adhipatiphalaṃ pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vipattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1795: daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ devamanuṣyamatiṣūpapadyamānānāṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vipākaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1796: niṣyandaphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇa ātmābhāvaparigrahayoḥ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate /
SA01asabhs_u:1797: adhipattiphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate /
SA01asabhs_u:1798: kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ sugatau durgatau ca vipāko 'bhinirvarttate /
SA01asabhs_u:1804: yena ekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhavanākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā anekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā //
SA01asabhs_u:1807: kāye yad audārikaṃ pūrvaṃ pacyate cyutikāle pratyupasthitaṃ vā pūrvaṃ bahulīkāratāṃ gataṃ vā atrasamācaritaṃ vā /
SA01asabhs_u:1809: yaduktaṃ sūtre trividhaṃ karma puṇyakarma apuṇya karma āniṃjyakarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1816: yaduktaṃ sūtre avidyālambanāḥ saṃskārāḥ puṇyāniṃjyā apuṇyāniṃjyāśceti /
SA01asabhs_u:1831: mithyādṛṣṭeḥ karmapathasya rāgadveṣamohaiḥ prayogaḥ / mohenaiva niṣṭhā /
SA01asabhs_u:1832: yaduktaṃ sūtre sādhāraṇaṃ karma asādhāraṇaṃ karma valavatkarma durvalaṃ karma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1841: yathā sattvānāmānyaiḥ sattvaiḥ saha anyonyaṃ darśanādikaṃ nopabhogo nopalabdhiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1846: prātipakṣikakarmabalavataḥ sarvaṃ saṃcetanīyaṃ kuśalaṃ karma balavadityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1847_0: tatkarma niśrityoktaṃ bhagavatā mamāryaśrāvakā apramāṇavaipulyakarmaṇi cittaṃ kuśalaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1847_1: paribhāvayanti abhisaṃskṛte sapramāṇe karmaṇi nākṣipanti nāvasthāpayanti na parihāpayanti tatsaṃkhyāte /
SA01asabhs_u:1848: yadapi pratipakṣadurbalapugdalasya saṃcetanīyamakuśalaṃ karma tadapi kuśalātkarmaṇo [Abhidh-s_56] balavadityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1849: yat punaḥ saṃcetanīyaṃ karma niyatavipākamaprahīṇamaparijñātaṃ tad balavat karma ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1850: tanmanasi nidhāyoktaṃ sarvaṃ ca kuśalākuśalaṃ karma niyatavipākamāryamārgeṇa prahīṇaṃ balavat karma ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1851: yadapi kāmapratisaṃyuktamakuśalaṃ karma yadapi pūrvamabhyastaṃ yadapi padasthaṃ yadapyasādhyamabhisaṃskṛtaṃ karma aparinirvāṇadharmataḥ tadapi prakṛtyā balavat karma ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1854: tadyathā kṣetrataḥ vastutaḥ svabhāvataḥ āśrayataḥ manasikārataḥ āśayataḥ sahāyataḥ bahulīkārataḥ bāhujanyataśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1856_0: bhagavatoktaṃ ya evaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalaḥ karma karotyupacinoti tathā tathā
SA01asabhs_u:1856_1: vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso na bhavatyavakāśaśca na prajñāyate
SA01asabhs_u:1857_0: yastvevaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalo yathāvedanīyaṃ karma karotyupacinoti tathā
SA01asabhs_u:1857_1: tathā yathāvedanīyaṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso bhavatyavakāśaśca
SA01asabhs_u:1859: tatra buddhā manasyevaṃ mithyāvacanaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ kāmayante /
SA01asabhs_u:1860_0: yat sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhasahagata eva vipāko 'bhinirvarttate duḥkhasahagatasya
SA01asabhs_u:1860_1: karmaṇo duḥkhasahagata eva vipāko 'bhinirvarttate aduḥkhāsukhasahagatasya karmaṇastatsahagata
SA01asabhs_u:1863: sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhavedanīyasya sukhavipāko 'nujñāyate duḥkhavedanīyasya duḥkhavipāko 'nujñāyate aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasyāduḥkhāsukhavipāko 'nujñāyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1864: duḥkhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhavedanīyasya sukhavipāko 'nujñāyate duḥkhavedanīyasya duḥkhavipāko 'nujñāyate aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasyāduḥkhāsukhavipāko 'nujñāyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1870: prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma dhyānasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma anāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1873: bhikṣusaṃvaraḥ bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇavasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerī saṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvaraḥ upāsikāsaṃvaraḥ upavāsasaṃvaraśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1891: dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ vījopaghāte sati kāmebhyo vītarāgasya yā viratiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1901: abhijanmato vā tatkarmasamādānato vā tatkarmādhyācāraniścayaḥ asaṃvara ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1903_0: aurabhrikāḥ kaukkṛṭikāḥ śaukarikāḥ śākunikāḥ mātsyikāḥ lubdhakāḥ vāgurikāḥ corāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:1903_1: ghātakāḥ govaṃdhakāḥ nāgavaṃdhakāḥ māṇḍalikāḥ nāgamaṇḍalikāḥ kārāgārikāḥ sūcakāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:1907: sukhavedanīyaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karma ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1909: kāmāvacarāt tṛtīyadhyānaṃ yāvad yat kuśalaṃ karma //
SA01asabhs_u:1915: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karma ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1917: tatkarma dṛṣṭe dharme yasya vipāko vipacyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1918: tacca maitrīsamāpatteruccalitasyaṃ parihāṇiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā kurvataḥ dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1919: yathā maitrīsamāpatteruccalitasya tathā araṇasamāpatteruccalitasya niurodhasamāpatteruccalitasya strotāpattiphalāduccalitasya arhattvaphalāduccalitasya ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1920: buddhapramukhe saṃghe kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca kurvataḥ dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1921: anyeṣāṃ tīvrāśayaprayogeṇa kuśalākuśalakarmapratipannānāmapi dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1923: tatkarma anantare janmani yasya vipāko vipacyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1925: api ca yānyanyāni kuśalākuśalāni karmāṇi yeṣāmanantare janmani vipāko vipacyate tatsarvamucyate upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma //
SA01asabhs_u:1930: kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākaṃ karma śuklaṃ śuklavipākaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ karma akṛṣṇaśuklāvipākaṃ vyāmiśraṃ karma //
SA01asabhs_u:1936: kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ karma yat karma vā āśayataḥ prayogato vā śuklaṃ yat karma vā prayogataḥ kṛṣṇamāśayataḥ śuklam //
SA01asabhs_u:1938_0: prayogānantaryamārge 'nāsravaṃ karma aviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasyānāsravakarmaṇaḥ paripanthamānukūlyasvabhāvamadhikṛtya
SA01asabhs_u:1938_1: vaṃkadoṣakaṣāyāṇāṃ śauceyānāṃ mauneyānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:1941: nidānataḥ utthānataḥ pradeśataḥ svabhāvataśca dānakarma vikalpyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1948: api ca aniśritadānataḥ mahāśucidānataḥ parama prahṛṣṭadānataḥ abhikṣṇadānataḥ kṣetrabhājanadānataḥ navapurāṇasaṃvibhāgadānataśca dānasaṃpad veditavyā //
SA01asabhs_u:1950: anabhidutadeyavastutaḥ aparāpakṛtadeyavastutaḥ akuthitavimaladeyavastutaḥ śucideyavastutaḥ dharmārjitadeyavastutaśca deyasaṃpad veditavyā //
SA01asabhs_u:1952: tathācoktaṃ sūtre śīlasamanvāgataḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛta ācāragocarasaṃpanno 'ṇumātreṣvavadyeṣu mahābhayadarśī śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣu iti //
SA01asabhs_u:1963: ataḥ paraṃ śīlamārabhya yad buddhena sūtreṣu nirdṛṣṭaṃ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavatītyevamādi //
SA01asabhs_u:1969: avipratisārādīnāṃ krameṇa saṃpratipattyā yāvat samādhilābhasanniśraya taḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1993: karmasvakā karmadāyādāḥ karmayonīyāḥ karmapratisaraṇāḥ karma sarvān sattvān vibhajati uccanīcatayā hīnapraṇītatayā [Abhidh-s_61] iti //
SA01asabhs_u:2003: yat karmaṇā sugatau durgatau vātmabhāvaprabhedaṃ labhante //
SA01asabhs_u:2009: akuśalasya karmaṇo hīnāsu tisṛṣu durgatiṣu aniṣṭavipākalābhaścintyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2017: tadyathā āyurvaśitayā cittavaśitayā pariṣkāravaśitayā karmavaśitayā upapattivaśitayā adhimuktivaśitayā praṇidhānavaśitayā ṛddhivaśitayā jñānavaśitayā dharmavaśitayā /
SA01asabhs_u:2020: tathā ca samudayasatyaṃ samāsato lakṣaṇaprabhedena caturvidham /
SA01asabhs_u:2023: punarbhavavāsanāyā āhārakaṃ kāraṇaṃ heturiti hetulakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:2025: teṣāṃ teṣāmupacitavāsanānāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye udayasya kāraṇamiti [Abhidh-s_62] samudayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:2027: pratyātmaṃ santānānāṃ sarvaprakāraprakarṣodbhavasya kāraṇamiti prabhavalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:2032: lakṣaṇataḥ gāmbhīryataḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthataḥ aparipūritaḥ paripūritaḥ niralaṃkārataḥ sālaṃkārataḥ śeṣataḥ aśeṣataḥ agrataḥ paryāyataśca nirodhasatyaṃ veditavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:2034: tathatāyāmārya mārge kleśānāmanutpādo yo nirodhāśrayo nirodhako nirodhasvabhāvo vā //
SA01asabhs_u:2037: manaśca teṣu āyataneṣu nāmarūpayorātyantikanirodho na śeṣaḥ iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2038: yaccoktaṃ tadāyatanaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā cakṣuśca nirudhyate rūpasaṃjñā ca virajyate yāvat manaśca nirudhyate dharmasaṃjñā ca virajyate iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2039: anena nayena ālambanānāṃ prāpaṇaṃ tathatāyāmālambanādūrdhvaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2043: tathoparamāt teṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodho nānyo vācyaḥ nānanyo vācyaḥ nāpyanyo nāpyananyo vācyaḥ na naivānyo nānanyo vācyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2046: asmiṃstvarthe prapañcotpattiḥ na saṃcintyā na mārgeṇa na nyāyena na kuśalaprayogeṇa cintyā iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2047: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ spraṣṭāvyayatanānāṃ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi /
SA01asabhs_u:2048: syādanyaḥ syādananyaḥ syādanyo 'pi nānyo 'pi [Abhidh-s_63] syānnaivānyo nānanyo 'pi iti niṣprapañca prapañca utpadyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2050: yadā ṣaḍāyatanānāṃ nirodhaśchedaḥ tadā prapañcānāṃ viratiḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2057: śaikṣāṇāṃ strotāpannaphalasaṃgraheṇa vā sakṛdāgamiphalasaṃgraheṇa vā anāgāmiphalasaṃgraheṇa vā yo nirodhaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2063: ubhayabhāga vimuktānāṃ traividyānāṃ ṣaḍabhijñānāmarhatāṃ yo nirodhaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2072: aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargaḥ vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi //
SA01asabhs_u:2119: kimupādāya sa nirodhaḥ punaḥ sauvarṇikamityucyate paramārthasukhādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:2150: yena duḥkhaṃ parijānīte samudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA01asabhs_u:2155: pṛthagjanānāṃ śīlam indriyadvārarakṣā bhojane mātrājñatā prathamarātrau taduttararātriṣu vā nityamamiddhaṃ vīryabhāvanā śamathavipaśyanā saṃprajanyavihāraśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2156: yadvā punaranyadaupaniṣadaṃ kuśalam śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā bhāvanāmayī prajñā //
SA01asabhs_u:2161: saṃbhāramārgopacitāni nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni ūṣmagataḥ mūrdhānaḥ satyānukūlakṣānti laukikāgradharmaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2163: pratyātmaṃ satye pvālokalabdhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2171: samāsato laukikā gradharmānantaramanupalambhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2175_0: duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2175_1: samudaye dharmajñānaṃ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānaṃ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2175_2: nirodhe dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ nirodhe 'nvayajñānaṃ mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ
SA01asabhs_u:2184: pūrvādhipatibalavicāraṇāmupādāya pratyātmaṃ duḥkhasatye pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā /
SA01asabhs_u:2188: kṣāntyanantaraṃ yena jñānena pūrvoktebhyaḥ kleśebhyo vimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:2191: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñāne ca pratyātmaṃ pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā utpadyate yaduttaramanvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇām /
SA01asabhs_u:2202: api ca eṣu sarveṣu kṣāntijñāneṣu animittaprekṣāvihārī veditavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2209: tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena prāpaṇanimittapramāṇaiḥ nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ mārgasatyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2211: abhisamayaprayuktā laukikena jñānena yathāvyavasthānaṃ vikalpoyanto yadabhyasyanti //
SA01asabhs_u:2218: yaduktaṃ sūtre virajño vītamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurūdapādi iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2220: tatra dharmakṣāntibhirvirajaḥ dharmajñānairvītamalam parijñayā prahāṇena mārgaśuddhilābhena ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2221_0: yaduktaṃ sūtre dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā sarvaiḥ tīrṇakāṃkṣaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2221_1: tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayaḥ śāstuḥ śāsano 'nanyaneyaḥ dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta
SA01asabhs_u:2228: aparapratyayaḥ mārgabhāvanāyāṃ na parataḥ svayaṃ kuśalāvarjanena /
SA01asabhs_u:2232: darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ laukiko mārgo lokottaramārgaḥ mṛdumārgo madhyamārgo 'dhimātro mārgaḥ prayogamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ vimuktimārgaḥ viśeṣamārgaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2234: laukikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamākāśānattyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanamākiñcatyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2242: tathā ca saṃkliṣṭacetasāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāḥ kleśopakleśāḥ pravarttante //
SA01asabhs_u:2249: pañcāṅgāni vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2251: catvāryaṅgāni adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāpratā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2253: pañcāṅgāni upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2255: catvāryaṅgāni upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiḥ aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā cittaikāgratā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2256: pratipakṣāṅgamupādāya anuśaṃsāṅgamupādāya tadubhayāśrayasvabhāvāṅgaṃ copādāya ārupyeṣvaṅgavyavasthānaṃ nāsti /
SA01asabhs_u:2262: lakṣaṇaprati saṃvedī manaskāraḥ ādhimokṣikaḥ prāvivejaḥ ratisaṃgrāhakaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ prayoganiṣṭhaḥ prayoganiṣṭhāphalaśca [Abhidh-s_69] manaskāraḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2266: mṛdumadhyādhimātraparibhāvitasya prathamasya dhyānasya phalaṃ trividhā prathamā dhyānopapattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2267: yathā prathamasya dhyānasya evaṃ śiṣṭānāṃ dhyānānāṃ trividhā dhyānopapattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2272: teṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nāmābhijñā api na bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2275: prāntakoṭikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvannaiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ viśuddhirityucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2277: bhāvanāmārge duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānāni dharmajñānānvayapakṣyāṇi taiśca saṃprayuktaḥ samādhiḥ prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ yāvadākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ,
SA01asabhs_u:2280: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā yāvadeva saṃjñāsamāpattiḥ tāvadājñāprativedha iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2287: mṛdumṛdurmṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇā kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmāvadhimātrādhimātramadhimātramadhyamadhimātrāmṛduṃ kleśaprakāra prajahāti //
SA01asabhs_u:2289: madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau madhyādhimātraṃ madhyamadhyaṃ madhyamṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti //
SA01asabhs_u:2291: adhimātramṛduradhimātramadhyo 'dhimātrādhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau mṛdvadhimātraṃ mṛdumadhyaṃ mṛdumṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti //
SA01asabhs_u:2300: api khalu kleśaprahāṇaprayogaṃ nirākṛtya dharmacintāyāṃ vā prayuktasya dharmavihāre vā samāpattiviśeṣe vā yo mārgaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2301: api khalu vaiśeṣikān guṇānabhinirharato vā yo mārgaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2307: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣāya bhūyobhāvāya vṛddhivipulatāyai yā bhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:2309: utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya yā bhāvanā //
SA01asabhs_u:2312: api khalu mārga utpadyamānaḥ svāṃ vāsanāmava sthāpayati sā pratilambhabhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:2313: sa eva saṃmukhībhūto bhāvanāṃ gacchati sā niṣevaṇabhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:2316: api khalu caturvidhaḥ pratipakṣaḥ vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣaḥ prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ ādhārapratipakṣaḥ dūrībhāvapratipakṣaśca pratipakṣabhāvanetyucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2325_0: api khalu vastuparīkṣāmārgaḥ vyāvasāyiko mārgaḥ samādhiparikarmamārgaḥ abhisamayaprāyogiko
SA01asabhs_u:2325_1: mārgaḥ abhisamayaśliṣṭo mārgaḥ abhisamayamārgaḥ viśuddhinairyāṇiko mārgaḥ niśrayendriyabhinno
SA01asabhs_u:2325_2: mārgaḥ śikṣātrayapariśodhano mārgaḥ sarvaguṇanirhārako mārgaḥ mārgasaṃgrahamārgaśca mārga ityucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2326: sa punareṣa yathākramaṃ saptatriṃśadabodhipakṣā dharmāḥ catasraḥ pratipadaḥ catvāri dharmapadāni śamatha(ai)
SA01asabhs_u:2328: smṛtyupasthānānāmālamvanaṃ svabhāvaḥ sahāyaḥ bhāvanā bhāvanāphalañca veditavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:2332: api khalvātmāśrayavastu ātmopabhogavastu ātmavastu ātmasaṃkleśavyavadānavastu ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2356: yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā evaṃ vedanādiṣu vedanādyanupaśyanā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2357: api khalu bhāvanā chando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāhaḥ utsūḍhiraprativāṇiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ apramādaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2376: taduktaṃ sūtre chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryamārabhate cittaṃ pragṛṇhāti cittaṃ pradadhāti /
SA01asabhs_u:2381: layauddhatyāpakarṣaṇe vīryamārabhate evaṃ tadanantaraṃ [Abhidh-s_73] cittaṃ pragṛṇhāti pradadhātīpratyucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:2390: chandovīryaṃ cittaṃ mīmāṃsā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2399: punaḥ chandasamādhiḥ yat chandaṃ janayan spṛśati cittasyaikagratām //
SA01asabhs_u:2401: cittasamādhiḥ yat cittaṃ pradadhat spṛśati cittasyaigratām //
SA01asabhs_u:2402: mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ yat cittaṃ pragṛṇhan spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām //
SA01asabhs_u:2406: chandaḥ vyāyāmaḥ śraddhā praśrabdhiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ cetanā upekṣā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:2413: api ca teṣu teṣu dharmeṣu adhigamaḥ prātiḥ karmaṇyatā vaśitā kāritraṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nānāvidhānāmṛdudhyādīnāṃ vastūnāṃ niṣpādanamadhiguṇānāṃ nirhāraśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2418: śraddhā vīrya smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2434: smṛtiḥ dharmavicayaḥ vīryaṃ prītiḥ praśrabdhiḥ samādhiḥ upekṣā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2453: samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyakkarmmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2467: duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā sukhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā sukhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā //
SA01asabhs_u:2478: adhyātmaṃ cittasya upanibandhaḥ sthāpanā saṃsthāpanā avasthāpanā upasthāpanā damanaṃ śamanaṃ vyupaśamanam ekotīkaraṇaṃ samādhānaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2480: yā dharmān vicinoti pravivinoti parivitarkkayati parimīmāṃsamāpataye /
SA01asabhs_u:2481: ca kāma pratipakṣadauṣṭhulyanimittasaṃyojanataḥ kāmābhibhavānāṃ viparyāsataḥ aviparyastacittasyāvasthāpanataśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2487: ekatyaḥ na śamathasya lābhī nāpi vipaśyanāyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2490: tasya śamathavipaśyanobhayamārga yuktasya samaṃ yugapat pravṛttiḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2499: prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlakānyapi bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2501: yathā prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlakāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti tathā sarvepāmūrdvabhūmikānāṃ bhāvanāmārge adhobhūmikāni kuśalamūlakāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2506: tadanantaraṃ nirantarāśrayapravṛttiḥ prāptakṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ daśāśaikṣā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2508: aśaikṣasya samyagdṛṣṭiryāyada śaikṣasya samyaksamādhiḥ aśaikṣasya samyagvimokṣaḥ aśaikṣasya samyag jñānaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2518: bhāvanāmārgagatasya taduttaraṃ saṃyojanaprahāṇamārgavasthāyāṃ yaḥ samādhiḥ prayogamārgasaṃgraho vā ānantaryamārgasaṃgraho vā /
SA01asabhs_u:2519: prayogamārgasaṃgrahastu tataḥ paraṃ sarvairāvaraṇairacchādyaḥ sarvāvarāṇānāṃ ca bhedaka iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2521: sa ca samādhiḥ nirantaraḥ dṛḍhaḥ ekarasaḥ vyāpī ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2522: etadarthapratibimbanārthaṃ [Abhidh-s_77] bhagavatoktaṃ tadyathā mahāśailaparvato 'khaṇḍo 'cchidro 'śuṣira ekaghanaḥ susaṃvṛtto daśadigvātākampyaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2528: hetukṣayeṇa yad śānaṃ labhyate kṣayaviṣayā lambanaṃ vā //
SA01asabhs_u:2530: phalaprahāṇena yad jñānaṃ labhyate phalānutpattiviṣayālambanaṃ vā //
SA01asabhs_u:2531: daśāśaikṣā dharmāstu aśaikṣāṇāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2545: kena hetunā satyeṣu anityaduḥkhādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa lauaukikākārāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2548: lokottarākāreṣu varttamāno 'nityārthaṃ paśyati sākṣādanubhavati notvanityaṃ paśyati abhilāpaprapañcamukhena /
SA01asabhs_u:2549: yathā anityākārā anityārthe evaṃ śiṣṭhākarāḥ śiṣṭārtheṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2555: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ nidānam avadānam itivṛtakaṃ jātakaṃ vaipulyam adbhutadharmaḥ upadeśaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2558: daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyan tathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharmaṃ deśayati sukhaṃ vyavasthāpayati sukhaṃ deśayati /
SA01asabhs_u:2559: śrotāpi sukhamudgṛṇhāti dharmagauravatayā kṣipraṃ bodhi saṃbhārān paripūrayati āśudharmatāṃ pratividhyati /
SA01asabhs_u:2560: buddhe 'vetyaprasādaṃ labhate dharme saṃghe cāvetya prasādaṃ labhate /
SA01asabhs_u:2565: sūtrāṇāṃ madhye vā ante vā gāthayā yad gīyate /
SA01asabhs_u:2572: 4. gāthā katamā / sūtreṣu pādayogena deśyate / dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadī paṃcapadī ṣaṭpadī vā //
SA01asabhs_u:2573: 5. udānaṃ katamat / sūtreṣu kadācit tathāgatena āttamanaskena yadudāhṛtam //
SA01asabhs_u:2574: 6. nidānaṃ katamat / pṛṣṭena yad bhāṣitam / sotpattikaṃ śikṣāprajñāptekaṃ vā / ato 'pi nidānam //
SA01asabhs_u:2576: 8. itivṛttakaṃ katamat / yadāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ pūrvalaukikaṃ vṛttaṃ deśayati //
SA01asabhs_u:2577: 9. jātakaṃ katamat / yat bodhisattvacaritapiṭakasaṃprayuktaṃ vṛttaṃ deśayati //
SA01asabhs_u:2591: evaṃ sūtrādīni dvādaśāṅgānyāryaśāsanāni triṣu piṭakeṣu saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2596: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ caitāni pañca śrāvakāṇāṃ piṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2597: nidānamavadānamitivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ caitāni catvāri dvayoḥ piṭakayoḥ saparivāre vinayapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2598: vaipulyamadbhutadharmaśca ete dve bodhisattvapiṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhīte bhavataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2599: upadeśa ekaḥ śrāvakabodhisattvapiṭakayoḥ abhidharmapiṭake saṃgṛhīto bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:2610: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2612: yaduktaṃ sutre cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ sālambanāḥ sākāraḥ sāśrayāḥ sasaṃprayogāśca /
SA01asabhs_u:2635: catvāri āryasatyāni ṣoḍaśākārāḥ tathatā sarve anityāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve duḥkhā saṃskārāḥ sarve 'nātmāno dharmāḥ nirvāṇaṃ śāntaṃ śūnyamapraṇihitamanimittaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2639: ṣoḍaśākāreṣu śūnye kati ākārāḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2652: skandhakauśalyaṃ dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyuasamutpādakauśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2656: yat dharmā dharmānabhiniṣyandayanti nahyeṣāṃ nirhetuko nāpi viṣamahetuka utpāda itīdaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam /
SA01asabhs_u:2659: yad adhobhūmikānāmaudarikatā ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ śāntatā tathatā catvāryasatyāni ca /
SA01asabhs_u:2671: anādikālāt svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇasthitadharmeṣu yā dharmatāpariniṣpattiḥ sā dharmatā //
SA01asabhs_u:2687: nāmaparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ /
SA01asabhs_u:2700: saṃbhṛtabodhisaṃbhārasya ūṣmagatādiṣu āryasatyeṣu ca yad vāhuśrutyam //
SA01asabhs_u:2734: kena kāraṇena vaipulyaṃ audāryaṃ gāmbhīrya ca deśyate /
SA01asabhs_u:2736: kena kāraṇena vaipulye ekatyā(ḥ) sattvā audāryagāmbhīryaṃ nādhimucyante uttrasanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2738: kena kāraṇena vaipulye ekatyāḥ sattvā adhimucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:2741: idaṃ ca sandhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye bodhisattvasya yathāruta mayoniśo dharmānvicinvataḥ aṣṭāviṃśatirasadṛṣṭaya utpadyante //
SA01asabhs_u:2743_1: pariṇatidṛṣṭiḥ anavadyatādṛṣṭiḥ niḥsaraṇadṛṣṭiḥ avajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiḥ viparītadṛṣṭiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2743_2: prasavadṛṣṭiḥ anabhyupagamadṛṣṭiḥ kusṛtidṛṣṭiḥ satkāradṛṣṭi dṛḍhamūḍhatādṛṣṭiḥ mūladṛṣṭiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2748: api khalu parikalpite svabhāve lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya paratantre utpattiniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya pariniṣpanne paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:2749: anutpannā aniruddhā ādiśāntā(ḥ) prakṛtiparinirvṛtā iti ko 'bhisandhiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2767: tatra pañcavidhāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvattirtamiti darśayati /
SA01asabhs_u:2768: pañcavidhā bhāvanā saṃbhinnabhāvanā animittabhāvanā anābhogabhāvanā uttaptabhāvanā parivṛttinibhaḥ(?)
SA01asabhs_u:2770: kena kāraṇena vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakadharmaḥ sarvasattvahitasukhādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:2779: roga caritaprabhedataḥ niryāṇaprabhedataḥ ādhāraprabhedataḥ prayogaprabhedataḥ phalaprabhedataḥ dhātuprabhedataḥ caryāprabhedataśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2782: rāgacaritaḥ dveṣacarita mohacaritaḥ mānacaritaḥ vitarkacaritaḥ samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaska caritaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2793_0: śraddhādhimuktaḥ dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimuktaḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ strotāpattiphalapratipakṣakaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2793_2: arhattvaphalapratipannakaḥ arhan saptakṛdbhavaparamaḥ kulaṃkulaḥ ekavīcikaḥ antarāparinirvāyī
SA01asabhs_u:2793_4: parihāṇadharmā arhan cetanādharmā arhan anurakṣaṇādharmā arhan sthitākampyaḥ arhan
SA01asabhs_u:2793_5: prativedhadharmā arhan akopyadharmā arhan ca pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2797: kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaraśca bodhisattvaḥ kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ acintyaśca tathāgataḥ pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2800: adhimukticārī bodhisattvaḥ adhyāśayacārī bodhisattvaḥ nimittacārī bodhisattvaḥ animittacāri bodhisattvaḥ anabhisaṃskāracārī bodhisattvaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2803: evaṃ dveṣacarito mohacarito mānacarito vitarkacaritaśca pudgalaḥ tīvrāyataviśiṣṭaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2809_0: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā śrāvakadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā mṛdvindriyaḥ svavimuktaye
SA01asabhs_u:2811_0: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā pratyekabuddhadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā madhyendriyaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2811_1: svavimuktaye praṇihitaḥ vairāgyabhāvanayā vimuktāśayaḥ kevalabhāvanayā cādhigatavodhyāśayaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2811_4: ārya mārgasaṃmukhībhūtaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ ekavihārī pratyekajinaḥ varggacāri duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2813_0: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā bodhisattvadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ sarvasattvavimokṣāya
SA01asabhs_u:2813_2: sattvān paripācayati śuddhāṃ buddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati vyākaraṇaṃ ca pratilabhate samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ca sākṣātkaroti //
SA01asabhs_u:2815: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya mṛdumātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ mṛdumātrāmokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ aniyatajanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2817: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya madhyamātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ madhyamātramokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgato niyatajanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2819: satyādhipatayaṃ dharmamālambya adhimātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ adhimātramokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ [Abhidh-s_88] tajjanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2820: punaḥ asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu mṛdumātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgato mṛdumātra nirvedhabhāgīyasanvāgata anivatajanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2821: saṃbhṛtāsaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu madhyamātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ madhyamātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgato nithatajanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2822: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu adhimātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ adhimātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ tajjanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2823: tatra trimātranirvedhabhāgīyo laukikāgradharmaṃ sthāpayitvā laukikāgradharmaprakṛtyaiva kṣaṇikaḥ aprāvandhikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2827: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāro mṛdvindriyaḥ paropadeśamanusmṛtya yaḥ satyābhisamayāya prayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2829: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārastīkṣṇendriyaḥ svayameva satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamanusmṛtya yaḥ [satyābhi]samayāya prayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2850: yadā darśana prahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt [stota ā]panno bhavati //
SA01asabhs_u:2851: kena kāraṇena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt strotaāpanno bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:2857: api khalu jñeyavipra[tipatti]kāraṇatāmupādāya dṛṣṭivipratipattikāraṇatāmupādāya pratipakṣavipratipattikāraṇatāṃ copādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:2859: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ pañcaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2861: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarasya ṣaṣṭhasya kleśaprakā[rasya pra] hāṇamārge yaḥ pugdalaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2863: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ saptamāṣṭamānāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2865: bhāvanāmarge kāmāvacarasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2866: yadā sarveṣāṃ kāmāvacarā[ṇāṃ bhāva]nāprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmī bhavati //
SA01asabhs_u:2874: bhāvāmrikasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2875: yadā traidhātukānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarvvakleśānāṃ prahāṇādarhan bhavati //
SA01asabhs_u:2882: strotaāpanna eva pudgalaḥ saptakṛtvo 'pi miśromiśra devamanuṣyeṣu bhavāt saṃsṛtya yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2884: deveṣu vā kulātkulaṃ gatvā [manuṣye]ṣu vā yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2888_1: yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti abhinivṛtto vā antarābhave upapattibhavagamanāya
SA01asabhs_u:2889: abhisaṃcetayitvā vā upapattibhavamabhisaṃprasthitaḥ [bhavānu]papatticchandaṃ yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2891: ubhayasaṃyojane aprahīṇe rūpadhātāvupapannamātra eva yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2893: upapannaḥ anabhisaṃskāreṇa yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2897: upapanno rūpāvacarāṇāṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvadakaniṣṭhagān praviśya tannānāsrava mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:2898: puna kaścid yāvad bhavāgragān mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:2899: api ca vyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya pañcaprakārā prabhedāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2901: taiḥ vyavakīrṇābhāvitasya caturthadhyānasya pañcaprabhedaiḥ yathākramaṃ paścasu śuddhāvāseṣūpapattiḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2903: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā cetayitvā vā acetayitvā vā dṛṣṭadharmasukha vihārāt parihāṇameti //
SA01asabhs_u:2905: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā acetayitvā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti cetayitvā na parihāṇameti //
SA01asabhs_u:2910: mṛdvindriya prakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt na parihāṇameti nāpi indriyāṇyuttāpayati //
SA01asabhs_u:2912: mṛdvindriyāprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhaviharāt na parihāṇameti kevala mindriyā ṇyuttāpayati //
SA01asabhs_u:2914: tīkṣṇendriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto va avikṣipto vā na dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti //
SA01asabhs_u:2918: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati adharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2921: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati āryadharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2923: yathā kāmāvacarāstrayaḥ tathā rūpāvacarā ārupyavacarā api //
SA01asabhs_u:2925: ārūpyadhātuvyavakarṣitena dhyānena saṃprayukto dhyānasukhairviharatīti kāmadhātāvapyupapanno rūpadhātāvapyupapannaḥ pudgala kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2928: kāmadhātau tuṣitabhavanayāsamārabhya yāvat mahāparinirvāṇaṃ darśayati sarvāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ buddhacaryāṃ mahācaryāṃ darśayatīti pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2938: acalā sādhumatīdharmameghāsu bhūmiṣu sthito yo bodhisattvaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2939: punaḥ khalu strotaāpannaḥ pugdalo yaduktaḥ sa dvividhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2942: sakṛnnairyāṇikaḥ satyābhisamayamabhisaṃpraviṣṭaḥ aprāpta samāpattimāśritya adhigatena lokottaramāgreṇa sakṛta traidhātukāvacarān sarvakleśān prajahāti prakāraśaḥ prajahāti /
SA01asabhs_u:2944: sa ca pudgalo bhūyo dṛṣṭe dharme maraṇakāle ājñāmārāgayati /
SA01asabhs_u:2952: satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrasya adhimuktiprasādasya pratilambhaḥ yathāsaṃpratyayaṃ caryā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2953: arthābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrāyāḥ satyeṣu dhamanidhyānakṣānteḥ pratilambhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2960: bhāvanāmārge tatsaṃvṛtijñānāni pratilabhate na tu saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:2963: ratnābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ / buddhe 'vetya prasādaḥ dharme 'tya prasādaḥ saṃghe 'vetya prasādaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2965: akāraṇasaṃvaralābhāt śikṣāgatasya yadātmano narakakṣayaṃ tiryagyonikṣayaḥ pretayonikṣayaḥ avāṅpatanadurgatikṣayaḥ iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2967: niṣṭhābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ / yathā mārgasatye niṣṭhāmārga uktaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2970: śrāvakāṇāṃ parato ghoṣamāgamya pratilambhataḥ śrāvakābhisamaya ityucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2976: pūrvokteṣu saptābhisamayeṣu yā samudāgamakṣāntiḥ no tu sakṣātkiryā /
SA01asabhs_u:2981_1: parigrahaviśeṣaḥ vyavasthānaviśeṣaḥ pratiṣṭhāparivāraviśeṣaḥ abhijanmaviśeṣaḥ janmaviśeṣaḥ phalaviśeṣaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:2987_0: apramāṇāni vimokṣāḥ abhibhvāyatanāni kṛtsāyatanāni araṇāpraṇīdhijñānam pratisaṃvidaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2987_1: abhijñā lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni pariśuddhayaḥ valāni vaiśāradyāni smṛtyupasthānāni arakṣāṇi
SA01asabhs_u:2987_2: asaṃpramoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamuddhātaḥ mahākaruṇā āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā
SA01asabhs_u:2991: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ sukhena saṃprayujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2993: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā duḥkhena viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:2995: [Abhidh-s_95] dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ sukhena na viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:2997: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā hita labheranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3001_0: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā avibhāvānād draṣṭarī rūpasaṃjñāyāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:3001_1: saṃniveśanād vā dṛśya rūpādi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddho samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca
SA01asabhs_u:3003: dhyānaṃ niśritya draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā vibhāvanād arūpasaṃjñāyāḥ saṃniveśanādvā dṛśya rūpāṇi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddhau samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3004: kathaṃ śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharatīti /
SA01asabhs_u:3005_0: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣu anyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāyā anyonyānugamasaṃjñāyā
SA01asabhs_u:3005_1: anyonyaikarasasaṃjñāyāśca labhāt tatra labdhe vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:3007: vimokṣānukūlā kāśānantyāyatanavimokṣaḥ tathā vijñānānantyāyatanākiṃcanyāyatananaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanavimokṣā api draṣṭavyaḥ yāvat vimokṣaḥ śānto vimokṣaḥ asaktyāvaraṇaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3009_0: naivasaṃjñānasaṃjñāyatanavimokṣaṃ niśritya samatikrāntānāṃ śiṣṭe śānte vimokṣe mokṣānusadṛśo
SA01asabhs_u:3009_1: vihāraḥ vihārasamṛddhau ca cittacaitasikānāṃ nirodhaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhāvaraṇād vimuktyartham //
SA01asabhs_u:3013: pūrvāṇī catvāri abhibhvāyatanāni dvābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ vyavasthāpyante /
SA01asabhs_u:3014: uttarāṇi catvāri abhibhvāvatanāni ekena vimokṣeṇa vyavasthāpyante /
SA01asabhs_u:3025: kṛtsnaspharaṇavihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ kṛtsnāyatanānītyucyante //
SA01asabhs_u:3031: dhyānaṃ niśritya kleśotpattyanurakṣāvihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3033: dhyānaṃ niśritya jñeya jñānapraṇidhisamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3037: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvadharma paryāyeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhīḥ prajñāśeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3039: dhyānaṃ niśritya lakṣaṇe abhiprāye [Abhidh-s_97] cāvyāghātasamṛddau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3041: dhyānaṃ niśritya janapadabhāpāyāmanuvyavahāre dharmanirvacane ca avyāghāta samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3043: dhyānaṃ niśritya dharmaprabhedeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3047: dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrarddhivikurvita samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3049: dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrāṇāṃ śabdānāmanuśravasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3051: dhyānaṃ niśritya parasattveṣu cittacaritaparyāya praveśasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3053: dhyānaṃ niśritya pūrvāntacaryānusmaraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3055: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvānāṃ cyutyupapādaprakāra saṃdarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3057: dhyānaṃ niśritya āsravakṣayajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3059: dhyānaṃ niśritya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairvibhrājamānasandarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayūktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ tatsamutthitavipākāśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3063: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamaśrayasyopādāne sthānaparityāgānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhīḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3065: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamālambananirmāṇapariṇāmanajñānānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3067: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ samādhimukhavaśavarttisamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3069: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ dhāraṇīmukhasandhāraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3073: sthānāsthānabalaṃ katamat dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra sthānāsthānajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3075: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra karmasvakajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3080: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārajñeyābhisaṃbodhipratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3082: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārasravakṣayapratijñā pratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3084: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākārāntarāyikadharmapratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3086: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākāra nairyāṇikamārgadharma pratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3089: gaṇaparikarṣaṇe sarvākārasaṃkleśāsamudācārasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ purvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3092: gaṇaparikarṣaṇe yathākāmamavavādānuśāsanīprayogasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3094: sarvākārasya yathāvat kṛtassa bhāṣitasya cābhilapanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3096: sarvajñasya sataḥ asarvajñaceṣṭitāsamudācārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3098: nirantaraṃ sarvaprakāraduḥkhālambanakaruṇāvihārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3102_1: asādhāraṇa karmasamudācārasamṛddhau asādhāraṇajñānavihārasamṛddhau ca yaḥ samādhiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:3104: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sarvākārajñatāsamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3106: viśuddhāni catvāri dhyānāni niśritya anyatīrthīyaḥ śrāvako bodhisattvo vā abhinirharati catvāri apramāṇānyevaṃ pañcābhijñāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:3107: śeṣān guṇān prāntakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya śrāvako bodhisattvastathāgato vābhinirharati //
SA01asabhs_u:3112: ye svakāritrapratyupasthānāḥ te lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhāḥ saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvā draṣṭavyāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3116: anukampāvihāritayā puṇya saṃbhāraṃ paripūrayati sattvaparipāke ca na parikhidyate //
SA01asabhs_u:3119: śubhanirmāṇe na saṃkliśyate śānteṣu vimokṣeṣu na sajjati /
SA01asabhs_u:3134: vākkarmaṇā cittādeśanayāvarjayati sattvacaritaṃ ca jñātvā āgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca niḥsaraṇe sattvān yathāvadavavadate //
SA01asabhs_u:3139: ākāṅkṣayankalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā tiṣṭhati āyuḥsaṃskārān vā utsṛjati /
SA01asabhs_u:3140: dharmavaśavarttī bhavati samādhivaśavartī saddharmaṃ ca sandhārayati //
SA01asabhs_u:3142_0: ahetuviṣamahetuvādaṃ pratyākhāyākṛtābhyāgamavāde ca samyaga bhyudayamārgaṃ deśayati
SA01asabhs_u:3142_1: sattvacittacaritāni cānupraviśya deśanābhājanatāṃ cāśayaṃ cānuśayaṃ cālambanaṃ ca
SA01asabhs_u:3142_2: saṃbhāraṃ ca bhavyatāṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathāvanniḥśreyasamārgaṃ deśayati /
SA01asabhs_u:3143: sarvamārāṃśca nigṛṇhāti sarvatra ca praśnaṃ pṛcchati pṛṣṭo vyākaroti //
SA01asabhs_u:3154: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhān kāyavāṅmanaskarmapariśuddhyā prāptyā cāreṇa vihāreṇa vābhibhavati //
SA01asabhs_u:3156: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasaṃśayāṃ śchinatti dharmanetrīñca dīrghakālamavasthāpayati yena paripakṣā (? kṣyāḥ)
SA01asabhs_u:3158: eṣvabhisamayeṣūttarottaraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ labhamānaḥ pūrvakaṃ hīnaṃ mārgaṃ vijahāti saṃkalanaprahāṇaṃ ca sākṣātkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:3159: nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau śrāvakaḥ sarvammārgasamavasargavihānyā vijahāti no tu bodhisattvaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3165: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvo bodhimanava vadyāmavakrāntaḥ strotāpanno na bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:3171: bodhisattvaḥ satyānyabhi samayena labdhvā daśasu mūmiṣu bhāvanāmārgeṇa jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣamārgaṃ bhāvayati na kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣamārgam //
SA01asabhs_u:3172: tathā ca bodhiprāptaḥ kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca vijahāti arhan tathāgataśca saṃpadyate //
SA01asabhs_u:3173: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvakleśāprahāṇāt mantroṣadhayo viṣamiva sarvakleśān abhibhavati sarvān kleśān doṣāṃśca notpādayati sarvāsu bhūmiṣu arhanniva kleśān prajahāti /
SA01asabhs_u:3174_0: api khalu bodhisattvo jñeyeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati upāyeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati
SA01asabhs_u:3174_1: abhūtaparikalpeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati nirvikalpeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati tena kālena
SA01asabhs_u:3177: bhrāntiḥ bhrāntyāśrayaḥ abhrāntyāśrayaḥ bhrāntyabhrāntiḥ abhrāntiḥ abhrāntiniṣyandaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3185: abhāvavikalpa bhāvavikalpaḥ samāropavikalpaḥ apavādavikalpaḥ ekatvavi kalpaḥ pṛthaktvavikalpaḥ svabhāvavikalpaḥ viśeṣavikalpaḥ yathānāmārthavikalpaḥ yathārthanāmavikalpaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3190: yāsau nimittato niṣprapañcanirvikalpatā tasyāḥ punaḥ abhāvasya pañca nimittāni /
SA01asabhs_u:3191: na amanasikārataḥ na manasikārasamatikramataḥ na vyupaśamataḥ na svabhāvataḥ na ālambane 'bhisaṃskārataśca /
SA01asabhs_u:3193: bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ indriyāpyuttāpayatīti /
SA01asabhs_u:3200: arthaviniścayaḥ vyākhyāviniścayaḥ prabhidyasaṃdarśanaviniścayaḥ saṃpraśnaviniścayaḥ saṃgrahaviniścayaḥ vādaviniścayaḥ abhisandhiviniścayaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3204: svabhāvārthaḥ hetvarthaḥ phalārthaḥ karmārthaḥ yogārthaḥ vṛttyarthaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3209: vipākaphalaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ adhipatiphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3211: upalabdhikarma kāritrakarma vyāvasāyakarma pariṇatikarma prāptikarma ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3213: sāmūhiko yogaḥ ānubandhiko yogaḥ sāṃbandhiko yogaḥ āvasthiko yogaḥ vaikāriko yogaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3220: parijñeyavastu parijñeyo 'rthaḥ parijñopaniṣad parijñā parijñāphalam tatpravedanā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3223_2: nayamukham parijñādimukham balā balamukham pratyāhāramukham abhinirhāramukhaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3225: yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacarakaḥ pūrvapadakaḥ paścātpadakaḥ dvikoṭikaḥ trikoṭikaḥ catuṣkoṭikaḥ oṃkāritaḥ prātikṣepika ityevamādayaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3227: aṣṭākārakāyadeśena aṣṭākārayāyadeśane ca [Abhidh-s_104] praśnavyākaraṇena sarvasatyamithyā viniścayaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:3236: vādaḥ vādādhikaraṇaṃ vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ bādālaṃkāraḥ vādanigrahaḥ vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ bāde bahukarā dharmāśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3238: vādaḥ pravādaḥ vivādaḥ apavādaḥ anuvāda avavāśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3245: avavādaḥ sattvānāṃ asamāhitacittānāṃ cittasamādhānāya samāhitacittānāṃ vimokṣalābhāya deśanāvādaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3246: dvitīyaṃ vādādhikaraṇaṃ rājakulaṃ vā prajākulaṃ vā prāmāṇikānāṃ sahāyakānāṃ dharmārthakuśalānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ nādasabhā vā /
SA01asabhs_u:3254: pratijñā hetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ upanayaḥ nigamanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ anumānaṃ āptāgamaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3258: hetuḥ tasminneva sādhye apratītasyārthasya saṃpratyayanimittaṃ pratyakṣopalambhānupalambhasamākhyānam //
SA01asabhs_u:3259: dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭa antena adṛṣṭāsya antasya samīkaraṇasamākhyānam //
SA01asabhs_u:3265: caturtho vādālaṃkāraḥ vādādhiṣṭhāne samyagyuktibhiḥ vādasabhāyāṃ gambhīro nipuṇaśca bhavatīti vādālaṃkāra ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:3267: svaparasamayajñatā vākkaraṇasaṃpad vaiśaradyaṃ pratibhānaṃ sthairyaṃ dākṣiṇyaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3270: kathāsādaḥ anyavastupratisaraṇena vyāvṛttiḥ bāhyavastuvacanena mūlaparatijñāparityāgaḥ krodhamadamānamrākṣādi pradarśanaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3273: ākulaṃ saṃrabdham agamakam amitam anarthakam akālam asthiram apradīptam apravaddhaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3274: ṣaṣṭhaṃ vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ guṇadoṣau vicārya vādānniḥsaratyakaraṇena vā prativādityabhājanatāṃ parṣado vaiguṇyamātmano 'kauśalyaṃ ca jñātvā vādaṃ na karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:3275: prativādini bhājanatāṃ parṣado guṇavattvamātmanaḥ kauśalyaṃ ca jñātvā vādaṃ karoti //
SA01asabhs_u:3278: svaparasamayajñatā yayā sarvatra nipuṇo vādaṃ karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:3279: vaiśāradyaṃ yena nipuṇaḥ samagraparṣadi vādaṃ karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:3280: pratimānaṃ yena nipuṇaḥ sarvāṃn kaṭhinān praśnān vyākaroti //
SA01asabhs_u:3281: api khalu svahitasukha kāmena vādeṣu abhijñātuṃ pravarttitavyaṃ na paraiḥ vivādaṃ kartum /
SA01asabhs_u:3283_2: samanupaśyatā na paraiḥ saha vivādaḥ kāryaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3290: asatpakṣabhiniveśadoṣaḥ kusṛtivacanadoṣaḥ akālikavākkaraṇadoṣaḥ kathāsādadoṣaḥ pārupyavacatadoṣaḥ cittāghātadoṣaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:3298: nirantaraṃ kuśaladharme 'bhāvite tu asamāhicittasya kṣipraṃ samādhilābhaḥ samāhitacittasya vā kṣipraṃ vimokṣalābho durlabhaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3304: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā rājānaṃ dvau bahuśrutau /
SA01asabhs_u:3305: rāṣṭraṃ sānucaraṃ hatvā naro viśuddha ucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:3312: api coktaṃ sūtre bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato dānapāra mitāyāṃ kṣipraṃ paripūriṃ labhate /
SA01asabhs_u:3320: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcadharmasamanvāgato brahmacārī bhavati parameṇa viśuddhena brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgataḥ //
